summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.3°C) and outside temperature (up 2.5°C).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 4859 lux) and cloud levels (up 103 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), light levels (up 4071 lux), dew point temperature (up 2.7°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 412m minimum and 1807m maximum, with an average of 950.5m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 894.9m and 855.4m.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and slight breezes. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and periods of sunshine are expected. The weather will likely remain the same.
